locale.Payment_Method1: to our account at Banque Misr, number 7835550914, mentioning your reference number, which is the mobile phone number registered with us, in the reason for the deposit or the reason for the transfer.

locale.Address: Ain Sokhna Road, next to the Secured Documents Complex
locale.Auspices: Under the auspices of His Holiness and Beatitude
locale.Booking_Contracting_Step1: The full booking amount is required to book the unit in the current phase.
locale.Booking_Contracting_Step2: The contract is concluded within a maximum period of 3 months from the booking date by paying the full contracting amount.
locale.Booking_Contracting_Step3: Upon contracting, the type of unit is chosen, whether central, peripheral, or peripheral to the street, and checks are written as shown according to the type of unit chosen, or cash payment for the remaining price of the unit and obtaining a discount of 70 thousand pounds.
locale.Booking_Contracting_Step4: A copy of the contract will be received from our headquarters after all contracting procedures have been completed.
locale.Change_Unit_Type_Text: You can change the unit type as long as the contracting procedures have not been completed.
locale.Check_Password_Text: Welcome back, please enter your password to login
locale.Customer_Service: Customer service from Saturday to Thursday from 9 am to 5 pm

locale.Payment_Method1_Text1: You can make a bank deposit or transfer to our account at Banque Misr, number:
locale.Payment_Method1_Text2: Mention your reference number, which is the mobile phone number registered with us, in the reason for the deposit or the reason for the transfer.
locale.Payment_Method2_Text1: You can transfer via the InstaPay application using our mobile number:
locale.Payment_Method2_Text2: Mention your reference number, which is the mobile number registered with us, in the reason for the transfer.
locale.Payment_Method3: You can pay electronically using your credit card through the link at the bottom of the page, with the possibility of paying from more than one credit card and we will collect the amounts paid in your account.
locale.Payment_Method_Hint: You can generally pay using more than one payment method and we will aggregate the amounts paid into your account.
locale.Pope_of_Alexandria: Pope of Alexandria and Patriarch of the See of St. Mark
locale.Privacy_Policy: The Privacy Policy has been read and agreed to
locale.Project_Feature1: The project is divided into 5 sectors designated for cemeteries, 4 of which are designated for lay people, while the fifth sector is designated for senior priests, priests, and senior deacons. These sectors are reached via a main axis with a width of 16 meters, a sub-axis, and a circular axis with a width of 9 meters, all of which are connected to external roads via main gates.
locale.Project_Feature2: The project includes a service area that serves the entire cemetery and contains a mourning hall, cafeteria, medical clinic, bathrooms, in addition to a building for honoring people. The project also takes care of security aspects by providing security personnel and spreading cameras in all places, with fences surrounding the entire project.
locale.Project_Feature3: The cemeteries are designed with a system of separate holes with an iron door on each hole, so that each cemetery consists of 9 holes in addition to a bone room below ground level. Each block contains 12 cemeteries and each cemetery has its own symbol in a way that can be reviewed on the main axis for easy access.
locale.Terms_and_Conditions: The Terms & Conditions have been read and agreed to
